about_the_game:
Gain Of Squad aims to deliver a multiplayer online first-person experience.

GOS AT LAUNCH
Battle royale, 5v5, Team death match, Death match FPS mode features.

You can enjoy the FPS genre with your friends or alone in game modes.

Key features of GOS;
A good experience with in-game fragmentable environment, tactical game mechanics, anti-cheat measures for a sustainable gameplay and less laggy server infrastructure.

Discord Community
We use Discord as a communication platform for bug fixes and suggestions.
You can create or join a team through our community.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence and blood as it is a battle royale and deatmatch FPS game.

detailed_description:
Gain Of Squad aims to deliver a multiplayer online first-person experience.

GOS AT LAUNCH
Battle royale, 5v5, Team death match, Death match FPS mode features.

You can enjoy the FPS genre with your friends or alone in game modes.

Key features of GOS;
A good experience with in-game fragmentable environment, tactical game mechanics, anti-cheat measures for a sustainable gameplay and less laggy server infrastructure.

Discord Community
We use Discord as a communication platform for bug fixes and suggestions.
You can create or join a team through our community.
name: GOS: Gain Of Squad

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen R5 1600 processor
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or later 64-bit (latest update)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-9600K or AMD Ryzen 5 3600 processor
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT

short_description: GOS: Gain Of Squad is a multiplayer FPS. Feel the battle with tactical mechanics and destructible environment in different game modes!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Estonian
